details.description:
Cabinet Office

After a period of six months whereOlivia wasembedded in the ODI from the Cabinet Office, she has returned tothe Transparency and Open Data Team. However,we are grateful that she will still be involved with the ODI and will be helping us by taking the lead on the Immersion Programme.

Olivia worked with Nigel Shadbolt to develop the ODIâ€™s business plan andwasthe primary liaison with the public sector.

Olivia has worked in the public sector for the last 10 years, the last eight having been in central government. She has a strong background in programme and project management having worked on developing PPM capability across Whitehall and embedding assurance processes. Olivia recently worked on a significant change programme within the Cabinet Office.

Olivia is also a fully qualified group exercise instructor teaching Les Mills programmes at some of the top gyms in London.
